title: TMBC Officially Releases StandOut Enterprise, the Only Engagement and Performance Solution for Team Leaders Today
text:
TMBC Officially Releases StandOut Enterprise, the Only Engagement and Performance Solution for Team Leaders Today Enterprise Platform Includes First-Ever Engagement and Performance Apps for Team Leaders, Available for iOS and Apple Watch October 16, 2015 12:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time 
LOS ANGELES--( BUSINESS WIRE )-- TMBC , transforming engagement and performance to help organizations build high-performing teams, today officially announced an enterprise version of the company’s proprietary StandOut platform. StandOut Enterprise is the only workforce engagement and performance management solution designed specifically for team leaders, equipping them with actionable insights to accelerate the engagement and performance of their teams in real time. 
Already in use in leading organizations such as Hampton Hotels and Mission Health, the solution caters to today’s reality of fluid, dynamic team arrangements – where employees may be part of numerous teams. StandOut Enterprise delivers key enterprise-specific features including: Engagement Pulse/Global Engagement Index Reporting – compare engagement levels across teams or divisions and benchmark overall engagement against your country average, Performance Pulse Index – view statistically-reliable performance measures of each employee neutralized for rater bias, Audience Management – flexibly create different user groups on the fly to view data and enable features by audience, based on exactly how work gets done for each team or organization, and API Configuration – allows for the integration of StandOut content via multiple devices and also via organizations’ proprietary platforms. 
“Over two decades of research on high performing teams has taught us what the best team leaders do to drive engagement and business results. We took these learnings and built technology to scale these behaviors across the entire organization,” said Heidi Spirgi, Senior Vice President of Product and Technology, TMBC. “Our solution helps all team leaders do what the best team leaders do naturally – anytime, anywhere, and on any device.” 
StandOut Enterprise also includes the first-ever iOS mobile and Apple Watch apps designed to measure and drive both engagement and performance, now available at the App Store. TMBC’s new iOS mobile and Apple Watch apps feature: Real-time activity feeds Ability to update and view check-ins Ability to create and view snapshot posts iOS notifications keeping team leaders current on the important happenings of their team Enterprise configurability and single sign-on 
“While it seems obvious, companies have yet to wrap their processes and technologies around the idea that so goes the team leader, so goes the team,” added Jason Averbook, CEO, TMBC. “We’re thrilled to provide teams today with the only solution that provides not just the technology, but also the supporting education and coaching to help to create and develop high-performing teams on a global basis.” 
TMBC’s leadership in the disruption of “employee engagement and performance status quo” is recognized with the HR Technology Conference’s “ Awesome New Startups for HR ” designation. StandOut Enterprise and the newest mobile apps will be showcased as part of the “Awesome New Startups for HR” session at the 18th Annual HR Technology (R) Conference and Exposition in Las Vegas on Sunday, October 18 at 3:45 p.m. PDT. Conference attendees are also invited to visit TMBC’s booth2253 to learn more about the company’s StandOut solution and to view a live demo. 
For more information, visit www.tmbc.com . 
About TMBC 
TMBC is transforming engagement and performance management by helping organizations build high-performing teams. Based on decades of leadership research, the company’s proprietary StandOut platform allows team leaders to gauge and act on real-time indicators of team strengths, priorities and engagement levels -- delivered anytime and on any device. The company combines strengths-based coaching with technology solutions to arm team leaders to fuel engagement and accelerate performance. TMBC clients include many of the world’s leading brands such as Chevron, Facebook, GE, HP, Intel and Starbucks.
